```{r setup, include=FALSE}

  library(readr)
  library(dplyr)
  library(tidyr)
  library(yardstick)
  library(ggplot2)
  library(patchwork)
})
source("../../pipeline/whatsthatcell-helpers.R")
```


```{r}
acc <- read_tsv(params$acc) |> 
  mutate(AL_alg = sub(".*-ALAlg-", "",  selection_procedure),
         selection_procedure = sub("-ALAlg-.*", "", selection_procedure))

cell_nums <- as.character(sort(unique(acc$cell_num)))
acc$cell_num <- factor(acc$cell_num, levels = cell_nums)

head(acc)

lapply(unique(acc$method), function(x){
  p1 <- acc |> 
    filter(method == x, (pred_lab_alg == "rf" | is.na(pred_lab_alg))) |> 
    ggplot(aes(x = as.character(cell_num), y = .estimate, fill = cell_selection)) +
    geom_boxplot() +
    ylim(0, 1) +
    labs(title = "rf", fill = "High confidence\ncell selection") +
    facet_grid( ~ .metric) +
    theme_bw() +
    theme(axis.text.x = element_blank(),
          axis.ticks.x = element_blank(),
          axis.title.x = element_blank())
  
  p2 <- acc |> 
    filter(method == x, (pred_lab_alg == "multinom" | is.na(pred_lab_alg))) |> 
    ggplot(aes(x = as.character(cell_num), y = .estimate, fill = cell_selection)) +
    geom_boxplot() +
    ylim(0, 1) +
    labs(x = "Cell number", title = "multinom", fill = "High confidence\ncell selection") +
    facet_grid( ~ .metric) +
    theme_bw() +
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1, vjust = 1))
  
  p1 / p2 + plot_annotation(title = x) +
    plot_layout(guides = "collect")
})
```


```{r fig.width=10, fig.height=8}
baseline_acc <- acc |> 
  select(-rand, -corrupted, -.estimator, -pred_lab_alg) |> 
  filter(cell_selection == "baseline") |> 
  unite("method", c(method, knn, res, cell_num, initial, seed, selection_procedure, .metric, AL_alg), sep = ",")

pred_lab_acc <- acc |> 
  select(-rand, -corrupted, -.estimator) |> 
  filter(cell_selection != "baseline") |> 
  unite("method", c(method, knn, res, cell_num, initial, seed, selection_procedure, .metric, AL_alg), sep = ',')

acc_gap <- left_join(pred_lab_acc, 
          select(baseline_acc, -cell_selection), 
          by = "method",
          suffix = c("_pred_lab", "_baseline")) |> 
  mutate(gap = .estimate_baseline - .estimate_pred_lab) |> 
  separate(method, c("method", "knn", "res", "cell_num", "initial", "seed", "selection_procedure", ".metric", "AL_alg"), sep = ",")
  
# 10k foot view
acc_gap |> 
  filter(method == "CyTOF-LDA",
         pred_lab_alg == "rf") |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = cell_selection, y = gap, fill = selection_procedure)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  facet_grid(cell_num ~.metric) +
  theme_bw()


lapply(unique(acc_gap$method), function(m){
  lapply(unique(acc_gap$pred_lab_alg), function(pred_alg){
    lapply(c('random', 'ranking'), function(init){
      lapply(c('rf', 'multinom'), function(al){
          acc_gap |> 
            filter(method == m,
                   pred_lab_alg == pred_alg) |> 
            filter(initial == init | is.na(initial) | initial == "NA") |> 
            filter(AL_alg == al | is.na(AL_alg) | AL_alg == "NA") |> 
            ggplot(aes(x = cell_selection, y = gap, fill = selection_procedure)) +
            geom_hline(yintercept = 0) +
            geom_boxplot() +
            labs(title = paste0("Method: ", m, " pred lab alg: ", pred_alg,
                                " Initial: ", init, " AL alg: ", al)) +
            facet_grid(cell_num ~.metric) +
            theme_bw()
      })
    })
  })
})
```
